Strong capabilities in utilizing tools such as **BIM**, **Bentley ProjectWise**, **Trimble Connect**, **Autodesk ACC**, **Dalux**, **Grasshopper**, and **Dynamo** to optimize project workflows and collaboration.

My technical expertise is complemented by my hands-on experience with frontend and backend development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and cloud deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**.
